title.rendered: The Scariest Bridge in the United States

content.rendered:
The Chesapeake Bay bridge is widely considered the single scariest bridge in America. It’s not necessarily the most dangerous but it terrifies most motorists, especially if they have a fear of heights or they get claustrophobic when on a narrow bridge.

The bridge itself can get around 200 feet high in certain parts and is roughly 4 miles long across the bay itself. The drive is so daunting for certain commuters that one man has even started a booming business that drives people, in their cars, over the bridge. He keeps the conversation casual and light and acts almost like a therapist of sorts for people who begin to feel panic attacks mid trip!

title.rendered: Car Tries to Cross an Open Bridge and Fails Horribly

content.rendered: When you’re coming to a bridge that either opens or extends you should ALWAYS treat it like some kind of safety hazard. You have no idea how many people fall victim to completely avoidable accidents like this. Here’s some footage of a car that must have ignored every warning that the bridge was not yet extended when it tried to cross. They not only fail to make it but manage to crush their front end on the other half of the extending bridge before hitting the water!

title.rendered: Watch What Happens When You Park In This Guy’s Bike Lane

content.rendered:
Some people take their biking more seriously than others. This enormous man, who’s practically the size of Game of Throne’s The Mountain, decides he’s had enough of cars blocking the bike lane. So when he finds one blocking his path, he gets off his bike and lifts the back end of the car ENTIRELY BY HIMSELF.

The best moment is how he simply gets back on his bike and rides off as if he didn’t even break a sweat!

title.rendered: Watch as Teens Rescue Elderly Couple From a Sinking Car After it Crashes into a Lake

content.rendered:
Two teens, Robbe Haems, 17, and Bjorn Cuvelier, 18, noticed a couple had crashed their car into a lake.

The boys didn’t hesitate to save the elderly couple from drowning.

Watch the video above to see part of the amazing rescue!

Note: The elderly man was saved, it wasn’t caught on camera.

title.rendered: Incredible World Record Semi Truck Jump!

content.rendered: If Evel Knievel worked as a trucker he would have been pulling stunts like this constantly! What does it take to jump a 22,000 pound truck about 166 feet on some ramps built into a common city street! Not only does he stick the landing while only blowing a few massive tires but he slides into a stop like a boss!

title.rendered: When This Guy in the Ferrari Starts Getting a Ticket You Won’t Believe What He Tries to Do!

content.rendered:
Someone captured this footage while walking around New York and stumbling upon a cop writing a parking ticket for a Ferrari 458 Spider. Thinking it might make for a decent video he starts filming. It turns out the car was parked inside the designated valet area for a hotel and while it’s unclear as to why the ticket was being issued in the first place the owner of the Ferrari approached as the cop was writing the ticket. The owner complains briefly and tries to refuse the ticket (Mistake #1) while getting in his car and starting it up.

Then, as you can make out in the video, as the guy tries to drive away he actually runs over the cop’s foot (Incredibly Huge Mistake #2)! That’s technically assault right there so the cop drags his spoiled ass out the window and gets set to arrest him. Then his girlfriend, Stephanie Pratt from the MTV show The Hills is left to drive him while he gets arrested.

title.rendered: You Won’t Believe What Happens to a Parked Ferrari

content.rendered:
Super car owners, like the owner of this Ferrari have all the reason in the world to be concerned about where they leave their car unattended. Strangers and pedestrians tend to notice things like a Ferrari and can’t help but stop to admire. However this owner decided to keep some cameras rolling to catch those passing by in action.

Many people wind up stopping to take selfies and that’s all well and good (especially if most look like the cute girl who stops her jog the second the car catches her attention) but those kids need to learn to not touch things that aren’t their’s! Don’t even get us started on what we’d do to that guy who spits no the windshield!

title.rendered: Biker Asks a Bike Cop to Race and He Agrees!

content.rendered:
This guy pulled up to a stop light and started chatting with the bike officer next to him. They compare bikes and talk about the weather when the biker asks the cop if he wants to race. The cop warns the biker that he’s got a turbo but that’s not scaring him. They take off and we won’t spoil the results but then the cop winds up getting fired for the stunt!

He’s since been reinstated but that’s one damn cool cop if you ask us!

title.rendered: Man Pulls a Gun on an Undercover Cop During a Drug Sting – Immediately Regrets It

content.rendered:
It started out as an undercover drug operation, but the bust takes a turn when the dealer draws a gun on an undercover cop.

His intimidating demeanor is quickly replaced with whimpering pleas as he’s dragged from the car by uniformed officers.

title.rendered: Watch This Douchebag Crash a Porsche 918 Spyder While Trying to Look Cool

content.rendered: Look at this idiot right here. This presumably rich and spoiled try-hard is trying to take off from some party in his Porsche 918 Spyder (that we’re sure he bought and totally not his dad…) when he decides to rev the engine to get the attention he so dearly needs. Except once he hits the gas he nearly runs over several people before crashing in front of the whole crowd!

title.rendered: Bike Cop Eats Pavement After Hitting Speed Bump

content.rendered: This police officer seems to be responding to a call along side many other cops when his bike is the first to hit a hard to see speed bump. Because it comes up so unexpectedly his back end gets launched and he has a hard time controlling the bike. It flips over and sends him face first into the pavement (lets hear it for helmets!) before almost bringing the entire bike down on top of him!

title.rendered: BMW M3 Driver Goes Off a Cliff!

content.rendered:
People love to give BMW drivers a lot of grief. There are plenty of assumptions and jokes about how they’re spoiled individuals or try-hards who just want to be seen in their BMW. This guy, however, doesn’t give other BMW owners a good reputation as drivers in general!

He’s chasing down another E92 BMW M3 and apparently trying his best to drive above his own abilities when he takes a sharp turn too quickly and drives right off a cliff! Luckily, the driver survived to upload this very footage!

title.rendered: Helicopter Landing Ends in Disaster When the Rotor Clips a Low Wire

content.rendered:
Disaster struck when a the back rotor of this helicopter clipped a low hanging wire.

Miraculously, the pilot was rescued from the wreckage with only minor injuries.

He even managed to walk away from the wreck with some assistance from two first res ponders.

title.rendered: Truck Takes on Massive Sand Dune at Full Speed

content.rendered:
This footage, from somewhere in the Middle East as far as we can tell, starts with a truck hauling ass through the desert. Then, once you see the size of the dune it’s aiming to climb you’ll realize why it needs to be moving so fast.

This is easily one of the most insane climbs we’ve ever seen!

title.rendered: Biker Gets Creamed By Gate When Checking Mirrors

content.rendered: Checking your mirrors is the sort of habit you can never do too much when driving a car or riding a bike but it’s important to know when to do it. This biker gets a little too caught up and doesn’t realize the gate has come down resulting in pretty embarrassing spill!

title.rendered: How Long Can an NFL Player Tough It Out in a Hot Car

content.rendered:
Arizona Cardinal’s free safety, Tyrann Mathieu teamed up with PETA to show the consequences of leaving a dog inside a car in warm weather.

Keep in mind, Mathieu can actually sweat…dogs cannot.

The results? Watch the video above to find out!

title.rendered: Lamborghini’s Paint Job Transforms Into Captain America

content.rendered:
There’s no better a canvas for an artist than a Lamborghini Gallardo. The cars themselves already look pristine and amazing but when you see what this Lambo’s paint job can turn into with a just some water you’ll be blown away!

A graffiti artist from German named Rene Turrek used temperature sensitive color changing paint to make this Italian bull look like the most American car that’s ever existed! Water hitting the back end reveals the stars and stripes while the hood gives way to the image of the first Avenger, Captain America himself!

excerpt.rendered:
There’s no better a canvas for an artist than a Lamborghini Gallardo. The cars themselves already look pristine and amazing but when you see what this Lambo’s paint job can turn into with a just some water you’ll be blown away! A graffiti artist from German named Rene Turrek used temperature sensitive color changing paint

title.rendered: Biker Dodges a Truck That Crushes his Ducati

content.rendered: Let us never forgot that trucks and buses typically have enormous blind spots. You always have to assume they can never see you and it’s your job to move around them, not the other way around. This poor biker found that out the hard way when he found a truck bearing down on him and he only had time to ditch his Ducati before getting crushed himself.

title.rendered: Waking up the Neighbors with 3,000 HP

content.rendered:
If you live close to others and they have to hear you roar in and out of your driveway whenever you get behind the wheel they may not like you too much (because they just don’t get it!). However, if they had to live next to this guy they might realize you’re a saint in comparison!
This twin turbo Ford Mustang comes screaming out of the garage with all 3,000 HP at once!

title.rendered: 1960 Custom Peterbilt Semi Truck Hotrod

content.rendered: Someone caught footage of this beauty all the way back form SEMA 2009. It’s Randy Grubb’s incredible 1960 Peterbilt Hotrod Truck named, perfectly enough, Piss’d Off Pete. Piss’d Off Pete is an aluminum built truck featuring a supercharged V-12 made from the 1060 Peterbilt semi-truck model 351.

category.description: Random, sometimes shocking, and usually for the lulz

title.rendered: How to Terrify Someone Napping in Your Passenger Seat

content.rendered: This passenger is simply trying to nap one off. Maybe it’s been a long drive, after all they’ve got a lot of stuff loaded in the back of the car. However, his friend decided to take this opportunity to scare him half to death with a chainsaw minus the saw.

title.rendered: Guy Gets Tasered Trying to Put Fake Poop on a Lamborghini

content.rendered: These two guys were driving along when they claim some guy in a Lamborghini cut them off, shot them the bird and was generally a huge jerk. So they followed him to where he was shopping and decided to prank him in retaliation by placing fake poop on the windshield. When the guy came out one man filmed from the safety of their car while the other pretended to be putting his shorts back on as if he had just finished the act. The driver of the Lambo wasn’t having it though. He winds up pulling out a taser (maybe he carries it for protection when he’s cruising in his Lambo?) and puts the fake pooper down. His friend jumps out of the car immediately and loses his cool trying to calm the old man down but the damage is done!

title.rendered: 150 MPH Motorcycles Catching Air on the Isle of Man

content.rendered: Check out these 600cc bikes practing over O’Dea’s Jump. These guys are INSANE professionals to catch air on this jump at up to 150 MPH on a bike!

category.name: Motorcycles
category.description: Vehicles on four wheels aren't the only ones out on the road. We collect stories about these two-wheel beasts here.

title.rendered: Peterbilt 359 RC Model Tows a Full-Size SUV!

content.rendered: One of the coolest RC models we’ve ever seen!  There are plenty of scaled models of RC cars out there in the world. Many go straight for points with attention to detail but few can preform on scaled levels like this Peterbilt 359 can! Not only is the detail there with the working smoke stacks but it can actually tow an entire Nissan Patrol!
